title: Can we get a skinline called 'Bronze Age'?
body:
Bronze age skinline, featuring Garen, Fizz, Master Yi, warwick, and Jinx

all champs that kill bronze players

replies.body: And they should wear Bronze Age clothes like Ancient Greek, Ancient Egyptian, Minoan, Ancient Chinese, Medieval Incan, etc.

Hahaha!  I think it would be funny.  The game should be allowed to make fun of itself.
Although, I wonder, if RIOT would regard it as too offensive.  They try hard to make champions equally viable at all ranks.
Mundo, going by the current rageposting.
